REPLAYING EXTERIOR CAMERA FOOTAGE FROM DESCENT LBREAK It looks like there's a rocky outcropping that's a different colour from the others near where you landed. Additionally there's some extensive ruins to the east and a large mountain southwest, though its sheer flanks would make it next to impossible to reach the summit. Most tantalizingly however a glimpse through the tree cover to the south east shows a stubby winged metal craft resting in the forest there. Assuming its a spacecraft then getting it to work might be your only chance to get off this rock.
